channel.title: Bs on The Personal Blog of Basil Labib
channel.description: Recent content in Bs on The Personal Blog of Basil Labib

item.title: Year in Books: 2020
item.description: Let’s Get Started The Rosie Project | Graeme Simsion My first read this year (2020). I started just after taking the last of my annuals and I remember laughing hard. It’s a romcom about a genetic professor suffering from Asperger’s trying to find a wife. The Wife Project still gives me giggles. Oh and I remember picking this up after seeing it on Bill Gate’s to-read list.
